options.content:
# ðŸ“Š Hinweis

- Audio- und Video-Daten ohne Livestream-Nutzung, mit Ausnahme der Livestream-Tabelle.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(date), 
  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" 
  AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen_mapped" 
  AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" 
  AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" 
  AND $zeitraum
  GROUP BY date
  ORDER by date ASC

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Visits')), 'Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Visits' as Visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Bounce Rate in %')), 'Bounce Rate in %')
FROM(
SELECT 'Bounce Rate in %' as Bounce
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Page Views / Visits')), 'Page Views / Visit')
FROM(
SELECT 'Page Views / Visit' as pi_visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Time spent/Visit in s')), 'Time spent/Visit in s')
FROM(
SELECT 'Time spent/Visit in s' as Audio_Videostarts
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio- & Videostarts')), 'Audio- & Videostarts')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio- & Videostarts' as Audio_Videostarts
)

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen_mapped"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $zeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_bounce_rate*m_visits,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0))*100 as summe,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen_mapped"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
--AND ${ZeitraumNew:raw} 
  AND $zeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as PI_per_visit,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen_mapped"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
  AND $zeitraum

SELECT
  SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS time_spent
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen_mapped"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
  AND $zeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE 
CASE "$Sendung"
WHEN "Panorama - Das Erste" THEN site_level2 IN ("$LRA", "daserste.ndr.de")
ELSE site_level2 IN ("$LRA")
END AND
"$Redaktionen_mapped" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $zeitraum
AND (("$LRA" = 'mdr.de' AND bi_av_url NOT LIKE '%app%') OR "$LRA" <> 'mdr.de')
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT IN ("live", "Live")

WITH nachrichten AS (
  SELECT 
  CASE page_chapter2 WHEN "thueringen" THEN "ThÃ¼ringen" WHEN "sachsen" THEN "Sachsen" WHEN "sachsen-anhalt" THEN "Sachsen-Anhalt" WHEN "deutschland" THEN "Deutschland" WHEN "welt" THEN "Welt" ELSE page_chapter2 END as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM   `Piano.total_visits`
  WHERE page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND page_chapter2 IN ("sachsen","sachsen-anhalt","thueringen","deutschland","welt", "hamburg", "info", "mecklenburg-vorpommern", "niedersachsen", "schleswig-holstein") AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND $zeitraum
  GROUP BY page_chapter2
), ratgeber AS(
  SELECT 
  "Ratgeber" as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM   `Piano.total_visits`
  WHERE page_chapter1 = "ratgeber" AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND $zeitraum
  GROUP BY Chapter
--), app_aktuell AS (
--  SELECT
--  "App Aktuell" as Chapter,
--  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
--  FROM Piano.total_visits
--  WHERE page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND page_chapter2 IN ("app_aktuell","app-aktuell") AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
), ndr_kapitel as (
  SELECT CASE page_chapter1 
    WHEN "nachrichten" THEN "Nachrichten" 
    WHEN "kultur" THEN "Kultur" 
    WHEN "sport" THEN "Sport" 
    WHEN "geschichte" THEN "Geschichte"
    WHEN "ratgeber" THEN "Ratgeber"
    END as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM  `Piano.total_visits`
  WHERE   site_level2 = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 IN ("nachrichten","kultur","sport", "geschichte", "ratgeber") AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND $zeitraum
  GROUP BY Chapter ), mdr as(
 SELECT * FROM(
SELECT
Chapter,
summe FROM nachrichten
  WHERE Chapter IN ("ThÃ¼ringen", "Sachsen" ,"Sachsen-Anhalt","Deutschland", "Welt" ) 
UNION ALL
SELECT
Chapter,
summe FROM ratgeber
--UNION ALL 
--SELECT
--Chapter,
--summe FROM app_aktuell
)), mdr_kapitel AS (
  SELECT CASE 
    WHEN page_chapter1 = "sport" THEN "Sport" 
    WHEN page_chapter1 = "kultur" THEN "Kultur" 
    WHEN page_chapter1 = "wissen" THEN "Wissen" 
    ELSE page_chapter1
    END as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM  `Piano.total_visits`
  WHERE   site_level2 = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 IN ("sport","wissen","kultur") AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND $zeitraum 
  GROUP BY Chapter
), mdr_not_nachrichten AS (
  SELECT * FROM mdr_kapitel
  UNION ALL
  SELECT * FROM nachrichten
  WHERE Chapter IN ("ThÃ¼ringen", "Sachsen" ,"Sachsen-Anhalt","Deutschland", "Welt" )
)
SELECT 
    Chapter, 
    summe 
FROM 
    (SELECT 
         'ndr_kapitel' as source_table, 
         Chapter, 
         summe 
     FROM ndr_kapitel
     UNION ALL
     SELECT 
         'mdr' as source_table, 
         Chapter, 
         summe 
      FROM mdr
      UNION ALL
     SELECT 
         'nachrichten' as source_table, 
         Chapter, 
         summe 
     FROM nachrichten
     UNION ALL
     SELECT
     'mdr_not_nachrichten' as source_table,
     Chapter,
     summe
     FROM mdr_not_nachrichten) as unified_table
WHERE 
    source_table = CASE WHEN '$LRA' = 'ndr.de' AND "$Redaktionen_mapped" = "nachrichten" THEN 'nachrichten'
                        WHEN '$LRA' = 'ndr.de' AND "$Redaktionen_mapped"!= "nachrichten" THEN 'ndr_kapitel'
                        WHEN '$LRA' = 'mdr.de' AND "$Redaktionen_mapped" = "nachrichten" THEN 'mdr'
                        WHEN '$LRA' = 'mdr.de' AND "$Redaktionen_mapped" != "nachrichten" THEN 'mdr_not_nachrichten'
                    END
ORDER BY 
    summe DESC

SELECT
publishing_date, 
content_titel,
sum(m_visits) as visits,
sum(m_page_loads) as page_views,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_bounce_rate*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS bounce_rate,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_homepage_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_homepage_anteil_visits,
CASE 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen_mapped" = "Alle Kapitel 1"  THEN page_chapter1 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen_mapped" = "nachrichten"  THEN page_chapter2 
END AS Kapitel,
content_id_sophora, url
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(publishing_date) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as publishing_date, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_id_sophora) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_id_sophora, 
page_chapter2, page_chapter1,
m_visits,
m_page_loads,
m_bounce_rate,
m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
m_homepage_anteil_visits, 
FIRST_VALUE(url) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as url, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_titel, 
FROM 
Piano.articles_joined_daily
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen_mapped" IN UNNEST(page_chapter1_tags) 
AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%verteilseite%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%nachrichtenfeed%'
AND page_chapter1 NOT LIKE "CONT"
AND objekt_typ NOT LIKE 'indexPage'
AND $zeitraum) 
GROUP BY content_id_sophora, content_titel, publishing_date, page_chapter2, page_chapter1, url, publishing_date ORDER BY 3 DESC 

LIMIT 100

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio')), '')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio' as Audio
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Wiedergaben')), 'Wiedergaben')
FROM(
SELECT 'Wiedergaben' as Wiedergaben
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Wiedergaberate in %')), 'Wiedergaberate in %')
FROM(
SELECT 'Wiedergaberate' as Wiedergaberate
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Video')), 'Video')
FROM(
SELECT 'Video' as Video
)

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE 
CASE "$Sendung"
WHEN "Panorama - Das Erste" THEN site_level2 IN ("$LRA", "daserste.ndr.de")
ELSE site_level2 IN ("$LRA")
END  AND
"$Redaktionen_mapped" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $zeitraum
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
AND (("$LRA" = 'mdr.de' AND bi_av_url NOT LIKE '%app%') OR "$LRA" <> 'mdr.de')
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT IN ("live", "Live")

SELECT
  REPLACE(CONCAT(ROUND(100*SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks),1), "%"),".",",") as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE 
CASE "$Sendung"
WHEN "Panorama - Das Erste" THEN site_level2 IN ("$LRA", "daserste.ndr.de")
ELSE site_level2 IN ("$LRA")
END AND
"$Redaktionen_mapped" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%Live%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%live%'
AND $zeitraum
AND (("$LRA" = 'mdr.de' AND bi_av_url NOT LIKE '%app%') OR "$LRA" <> 'mdr.de')

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio')), 'Audio')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio' as Audio
)

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE 
CASE "$Sendung"
WHEN "Panorama - Das Erste" THEN site_level2 IN ("$LRA", "daserste.ndr.de")
ELSE site_level2 IN ("$LRA")
END AND
"$Redaktionen_mapped" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $zeitraum
AND (av_content_type = "audio" OR av_content_type = "Audio")
AND (("$LRA" = 'mdr.de' AND bi_av_url NOT LIKE '%app%') OR "$LRA" <> 'mdr.de')
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT IN ("live", "Live")

SELECT 
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as summe
  REPLACE(CONCAT(ROUND(100*SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks)*1.0), "%"),".",",") as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE 
CASE "$Sendung"
WHEN "Panorama - Das Erste" THEN site_level2 IN ("$LRA", "daserste.ndr.de")
ELSE site_level2 IN ("$LRA")
END 
AND "$Redaktionen_mapped" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) 
AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND (av_content_type = "audio" OR av_content_type = "Audio")
AND $zeitraum
AND (("$LRA" = 'mdr.de' AND bi_av_url NOT LIKE '%app%') OR "$LRA" <> 'mdr.de')
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT IN ("live", "Live")

SELECT 
bi_av_publication_date,
bi_av_content, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_url as url,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
CONCAT(CONCAT(

Â  CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)Â  END ,

Â  ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)Â  END)," Min") as av_content_duration,
ROUND(AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate),4) wiedergaberate,
av_content_type,
bi_av_broadcasting_type,
--device_type,
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_publication_date) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_publication_date, 
m_av_playbacks,
CAST(av_content_duration/1000 AS INT) as av_content_duration,
m_av_average_playback_completion_rate,
av_content_type, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_broadcasting_type, 
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_url) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_url, 

--device_type,
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE CASE "$Sendung"
WHEN "Panorama - Das Erste" THEN site_level2 IN ("$LRA", "daserste.ndr.de")
ELSE site_level2 IN ("$LRA")
END AND
"$Redaktionen_mapped" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type = "ondemand"
AND (("$LRA" = 'mdr.de' AND bi_av_url NOT LIKE '%app%') OR "$LRA" <> 'mdr.de')
AND $zeitraum)
GROUP BY bi_av_publication_date,bi_av_content,av_content_duration,av_content_type,bi_av_content_id, bi_av_broadcasting_type, bi_av_url
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 5 DESC
Limit 100

panels.title: Top 100 Web Audios & Videos on Demand

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
bi_av_publication_date,
bi_av_content, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_url as url,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
--CONCAT(CONCAT(

Â -- CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)Â  END ,

-- ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)Â  END)," Min") as av_content_duration,
--AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) wiedergaberate,
av_content_type,
bi_av_broadcasting_type,
--device_type,
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_publication_date) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_publication_date, 

m_av_playbacks,
--CAST(av_content_duration/1000 AS INT) as av_content_duration,
--m_av_average_playback_completion_rate,
av_content_type, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_broadcasting_type, 
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_url) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_url, 
--device_type,
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE CASE "$Sendung"
WHEN "Panorama - Das Erste" THEN site_level2 IN ("$LRA", "daserste.ndr.de")
ELSE site_level2 IN ("$LRA")
END AND
"$Redaktionen_mapped" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type = "live"
AND (("$LRA" = 'mdr.de' AND bi_av_url NOT LIKE '%app%') OR "$LRA" <> 'mdr.de')
AND $zeitraum)
 GROUP BY bi_av_publication_date,bi_av_content,
--av_content_duration,
av_content_type,bi_av_content_id, bi_av_broadcasting_type, bi_av_url
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 5 DESC
Limit 100

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), 
  src_referrer_site_domain 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro_joined_daily` 
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen_mapped"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
  AND $zeitraum
AND src_referrer_site_domain NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND CASE WHEN 
      site_level2 = "mdr.de" 
      THEN (distribution = "web" OR distribution ="amp")
      ELSE 1=1 END 
GROUP BY src_referrer_site_domain 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), 
  device_type 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro_joined_daily` 
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen_mapped"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
  AND $zeitraum
AND device_type NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND CASE WHEN 
      site_level2 = "mdr.de" 
      THEN (distribution = "web" OR distribution ="amp")
      ELSE 1=1 END 
GROUP BY device_type 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), 
  src 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro_joined_daily` 
WHERE  
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen_mapped"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
  AND $zeitraum
AND src NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND CASE WHEN 
      site_level2 = "mdr.de" 
      THEN (distribution = "web" OR distribution ="amp")
      ELSE 1=1 END 
GROUP BY src 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

WITH referrer AS(
--cached version
SELECT 
  content_titel,
  SUM(m_visits) as Visits,
  referrer,
  $sophora as content_id_sophora,
  distribution as Distribution
FROM
(
  SELECT
  FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER (PARTITION BY $sophora ORDER BY date DESC) as content_titel,
  --content_titel,
  m_visits, 
  referrer,
  $sophora,
  distribution,
  date
  FROM `$distroRefTable`
  WHERE
     site_level2 = "${LRA}"
     AND CASE "${Redaktionen:text}"
     WHEN "Alle Kapitel 1" THEN TRUE 
     ELSE LOWER(page_chapter1) = LOWER("$Redaktionen_mapped") END
     AND CASE "${Unterkapitel:text}"
     WHEN "Alle Kapitel 2" THEN TRUE
     ELSE LOWER(page_chapter2) = LOWER("$Unterkapitel") END
    AND $zeitraum
    AND referrer NOT LIKE "%N/A%"
)
GROUP BY 
Distribution, 
referrer,
content_titel,
content_id_sophora
ORDER BY Visits DESC), 
-- Articles data
articles AS (
  SELECT content_id_sophora FROM(
  SELECT
publishing_date, 
content_titel,
sum(m_visits) as visits,
sum(m_page_loads) as page_views,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_bounce_rate*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS bounce_rate,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_homepage_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_homepage_anteil_visits,
CASE 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen_mapped" = "Alle Kapitel 1"  THEN page_chapter1 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen_mapped" = "nachrichten"  THEN page_chapter2 
END AS Kapitel,
content_id_sophora, url
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(publishing_date) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as publishing_date, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_id_sophora) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_id_sophora, 
page_chapter2, page_chapter1,
m_visits,
m_page_loads,
m_bounce_rate,
m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
m_homepage_anteil_visits, 
FIRST_VALUE(url) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as url, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_titel, 
FROM 
Piano.articles_joined_daily
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen_mapped" IN UNNEST(page_chapter1_tags) 
AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%verteilseite%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%nachrichtenfeed%'
AND page_chapter1 NOT LIKE "CONT"
AND objekt_typ NOT LIKE 'indexPage'
AND $zeitraum) 
GROUP BY content_id_sophora, content_titel, publishing_date, page_chapter2, page_chapter1, url, publishing_date ORDER BY visits DESC 
)
ORDER BY visits 
)
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM referrer JOIN articles USING(content_id_sophora) ORDER by visits  DESC LIMIT 100

query.rawSql:
SELECT distinct media_house FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA"

SELECT distinct LRA FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(REPLACE(LRA,".de","")))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT distinct page_chapter1 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "kultur"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "mdr.de" THEN "MDR ThÃ¼ringen - Das Radio" END
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "mdr.de" THEN "in-aller-freundschaft" END
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "mdr.de" THEN "altpapier" END
)
WHERE page_chapter1 != ""
ORDER BY page_chapter1 ASC

SELECT distinct page_chapter2 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen_mapped"
AND page_chapter2  NOT IN ("app-aktuell", "app_aktuell")
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "Alle Kapitel 2"
ORDER BY page_chapter2 ASC

SELECT distinct sendungs_id FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen_mapped" AND page_chapter2="$Unterkapitel"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "Alle Sendungs-ID"
ORDER BY sendungs_id ASC

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE 

       --  case: "Last 24 HOURS "
    WHEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin") >= CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin")  OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN """date  = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 1 DAY)"""
    -- case: CURRENT_DATE()
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin") 
    THEN  """date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("$HeuteDatum", INTERVAL 1 DAY)"""
    ELSE  """date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")"""

    END

SELECT CASE CONTAINS_SUBSTR("""${zeitraum}""", "DATE_ADD")
WHEN True  THEN "## Hinweis: FÃ¼r den ausgewÃ¤hlten Zeitraum liegen keine Daten vor. Um Daten auswerten zu kÃ¶nnen, bitte gestern oder grÃ¶ÃŸere ZeitrÃ¤ume auswÃ¤hlen."
ELSE """## Der ausgewertete Zeitraum lautet: $fromDay - $toDay """
END

SELECT CASE 
-- case: last x<24 hours
    WHEN TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN   FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 1 DAY))
-- SECOND case: today or bigger
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin") 
    THEN FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 1 DAY))
ELSE FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 0 DAY))
END

SELECT 
  CASE "${LRA:text}"
  WHEN "mdr.de" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_articles_distro_referrer_daily"
  WHEN "kika.de" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_articles_distro_referrer_daily"
  WHEN "ndr.de" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_articles_distro_referrer_daily"
  WHEN "eurovision.de" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_articles_distro_referrer_daily"
  WHEN "ardkultur.de" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_articles_distro_referrer_daily"
END

SELECT
CASE "${LRA:text}"
WHEN "mdr.de" THEN "cms_id"
WHEN "kika.de" THEN "cms_id"
WHEN "ndr.de" THEN "content_id_sophora"
WHEN "eurovision.de" THEN "content_id_sophora"
WHEN "ardkultur.de" THEN "content_id_sophora"
END as cis

SELECT CASE """$Redaktionen"""
       WHEN "MDR ThÃ¼ringen - Das Radio" THEN  "mdr-thueringen"
       ELSE "$Redaktionen"
       END

WITH nutzer AS (
  SELECT
CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "dev") THEN "dev"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "mefo") THEN "mefo"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@") THEN
      REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'@([^\.]+)')  -- Extracts part after '@' and before the first '.' Example: ad.westphal@ndr.de => ndr
    WHEN NOT CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@")
         AND (CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "viewer") 
         OR CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "podcast")) THEN
            REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'^([^-\s]+)')  -- Extracts part before the first '-'. Example: ndr-viewer => ndr
    ELSE
      "Anonym"
  END AS nutzer_lra
),
filter_string AS (
  SELECT """
LRA=${LRA}|::|Redaktionen=${Redaktionen}|::|Unterkapitel=${Unterkapitel}|::|Sendung=${Sendung}|::|Zeitraum_von=${fromDay}|::|Zeitraum_bis=${toDay}
""" AS filter
)

SELECT CONCAT(
  "https://vqggwrz.pa-cd.com/event?s=645199&idclient=minerva&events=%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22page.display%22%2C%22data%22%3A%7B%22page%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.name}",
  "%22%2C%22m_visits%22%3A1%2C%22minerva_dashboard_id%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.uid}",
  "%22%2C%22minerva_lra%22%3A%22",
  nutzer.nutzer_lra,
  "%22%2C%22minerva_filter%22%3A%22",
  filter_string.filter,
  "%22%7D%7D%5D"
) AS event_url
FROM nutzer, filter_string
